alert.note: Alert for Dawson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 12:14AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Dawson County through 100 AM CDT... At 1214 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Brady, or 25 miles east of North Platte, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Eddyville. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 209 and 243. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
